name: test_e2e_with_logs[SQLI_TIME_013]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_TIME_013` |
| **Name** | Sleep with SQL comment |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | time_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `SLEEP/*comment*/(5)`
- **Encoded**: `SLEEP/%2Acomment%2A/%285%29`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Rule ID** | `ADV_SQLI_001` |
| **Expected Rule** | Time-based Blind SQL Injection |
| **Actual Rule** | [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_TIME_013-1765111556123-50pdl pattern_id=SQLI_TIME_013 uri=/?q=SLEEP/%2Acomment%2A/%285%29 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET |
| **Match Status** | `MATCH` |

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~16000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:45:56.000 UTC
